name: snaphy-react-sortable-dnd
description: React Sortable HOC build from React HOC

scripts.build:babel: ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./Manager.js  -d dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./utils.js  -d dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./SortableHandle  -d dist/SortableHandle && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./SortableGroup  -d dist/SortableGroup && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./SortableElement  -d dist/SortableElement && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./DragLayer  -d dist/DragLayer && ./node_modules/.bin/babel ./SortableContainer  -d dist/SortableContainer && ./node_modules/.bin/babel index.js  -d dist

author: Robins Gupta
